== Kizhakkumbhagom (CT) (627977) ==

Kizhakkumbhagom (CT) is a town in the [[Aluva]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 7.13 sq. km. and harbouring 2714 households with total population of 10791 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 43 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 260 km. Male population is 5320 and female population is 5471. Scheduled Caste population is 648 and Scheduled Tribes population is 33. Census Location Code of the town is 627977<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 36 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 36 km. Railway station is at Chowwara at a distance of 6 km.
